entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Framework 4.8 Class Library compatibility issue with Azure.Storage.Blob package #93177
  • Deadlock in ThreadPool.GetMaxThreads() during app start. #93175
  • ISimdVector issue (GVM resolution doesn't report [Intrinsic]?) #93174
    9.0.0
  • Follow-Up: Issue-URL Cleanup #93172
  • 8.0.0-rc.1 Library not loaded: /System/Library/Frameworks/CryptoKit.framework/Versions/A/CryptoKit #93167
    Future
  • Test failure Interop/StructMarshalling/ReversePInvoke/MarshalSeqStruct/ReversePInvoke/ReversePInvokeTest/ReversePInvokeTest.sh #93166
  • Test failure readytorun/JittedMethodsCountingTest/JittedMethodsCountingTest/JittedMethodsCountingTest.sh #93163
  • Test failure GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #93162
  • Cannot use ConfigurationBinder source generator with a type that has a string ctor parameter with default value #93159
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.sh #93161
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Serialization/Deserialize/Deserialize.dll #93165
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #93164
  • Test failure: SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException #20675
    9.0.0
  • Publishing with AOT for `linux-musl-x64` links an incorrect interpreter #93158

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add new nativeaot files to the platform manifest #93181
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Update comment with min OS version locations to update #93180
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SPMI: Fix 'misses' fraction computation and calculate total contexts correctly #93179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix clsHnd in impImportCall #93176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Obsolete `AuthenticationManager` of `System.Net.Requests` #93171
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.IndexOfXx corner-case when first element is seed value #93169
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Consolidate a few exception throws in TensorPrimitives #93168
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix Decimal literal formatting in source generators #93160
    area-Extensions-Configuration

Merged

  • [mono] Update emsdk #93170
    area-Workloads, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Use C11 _Noreturn (or [[noreturn]]) instead of GCC attribute #93131
    area-Build-mono
  • Change SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException server to Loopback #93025
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Merge CoreMangLib, Exceptions and Interop folders #91901
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix Options Source Gen Trimming Issues #93088
    area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • Optimize Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCase_Vector with AVX2 and AVX512 #93116
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix a memory leak in runtime interop stubs when using an array of structs of types that use old-style managed marshalers #93089
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: Support retbuf optimization for non 'lvIsTemp' locals #93071
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update JIT debug helpers #93086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use our now-split MarshalAs parsing to simplify our "forwarder with marshalling attributes" logic #93157
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder #93115
    area-System.Reflection
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Update APICompat suppression files to ignore TFMs #93129
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch for WASM projects restart does not work #35930
  • Make the interface support implicit operators? #35923
  • [NETSDKE2E]CoreCLR symbols are missing while debugging IL Symbols in VS 17.8 preview 3. #35922
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 SDK installed, The message "Manifest package for microsoft.net.sdk.aspire doesn't exist" displays during installing workload. #35921
  • [NETSDKE2E]Duplicate workload version info displays in dotnet --info of NET8 RTM SDK #35920

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx] APICompat - Use compatible assembly references #35924
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #35913
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload manifest updater cleanup #35859
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • File local types should hash mapped paths to generate type names #70284
    17.9

Closed

  • Records: Optimize trivial equality check using `==` #47741

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: synthesized list types should implement ICollection and IList #70288
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support cases where an array was assigned to a span type. #70287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70286
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Short-circuit tagger usage of interval tree when tagging complete snapshot #70285
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update the weather page in the Blazor Web App template to persist prerendered state #51205
  • Add a weather API call to the Blazor Web App template when global interactivity is enabled with WebAssembly/Auto #51204
  • Support using Blazor pages with status code pages middleware #51203
  • Add Microsoft Identity Platform auth option to the Blazor Web App template #51202
  • Type of script element defined in HeadContent of page gets escaped #51199
  • [NETSDKE2E] Alpine Only, with .NET 8.0 RTM warning: Failed to read or parse localization file when creating new project for the first time. #51198
  • Could not load file or assembly 'em_10 (Blazor hot reload) #51197
  • DisableAntiforgery has no effect when applied on RouteGroupBuilder #51194

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51191
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plainTextWithFilter #51195
  • Use additional metadata alongside modified date when determining whether to update compressed assets #44671
    .NET 9 Planning
  • JSInterop does not support nullable struct #44922
    .NET 9 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix pluralization of 'scheme' in doc comments #51206
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Sync shared code from runtime #51196
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Fix handling of default values in RDG #51193
    area-minimal
  • Add file extension #51018
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Add SetBrowserRequestStreamingEnabled extension method #50481
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51145
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Update Identity Components in Blazor project template #51134
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView shows all items one over the other when the first item have no data #17891
  • CollectionView items height is all over the place when scrolling on iOS (.Net 8 + MAUI workload 8.0.0-rc.1.9171/8.0.100-rc.1) #17890
  • DotNet MAUI with .Net 7 fails to open Websocket in Android Foreground Service #17889
  • Splash Screen Issue on Tablets in both portrait and landscape modes #17887
  • MAUI Android Shadow function is missing internal View.Context.ToPixels() function to get proper scaling (simple proof included) #17886
  • The width of CollectionView's footer and header is not correct #17885
  • Entire words ommitted from Label display in Android with specific shadow/hierarchy settings (no issue in Windows/iOS) #17884
  • Android not allowing AbsoluteLayout/VerticalStackLayout Height and Width to be set properly (working on iOS/Windows) #17883
  • VerticalStackLayout/AbsoluteLayout add a 1 pixel padding even when padding is set to zero (Windows/iOS/Android all affected) #17882
  • Border with Shadow triggering "[View] ContentViewGroup not displayed because it is too large to fit into a software layer (or drawing cache)" in Android #17881

Closed

  • Hot Reload Problem : Read out of bounds #9363
  • CollectionView still has default spacing between items, despite numerous PRs to fix it #17851
  • Android App crash if the itemtemplate of CollectionView have MultiBinding #17711
  • Android App crashes if CollectionView have more than one item #17735
  • Windows app only shows first item in the CollectionView #17736

PullRequests

Created

  • Limit star expansion when measuring/arranging at constrained sizes #17880

Updated

  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IEntityTypeConfiguration<T> defined on a record DB model type does not seem to be picked up or applied during model building #31993
  • Changing the result after reader executed in a DbCommandInterceptor #31991
  • Query: when navigating from dependent to principal to another dependent we can skip the principal table and just compare FKs on the dependent tables in some cases #31989

Closed

  • Nested Inserts #31987

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Open the connection before creating the DbCommand #31988
    Servicing-consider

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Treat SQL Pool warmup/pause errors as transient #31739
    Servicing-consider, community-contribution
